title: County-wide measles alert declared for Parkland County
desc: Public health officials have declared a county-wide measles alert for Parkland County. The general public alert was issued Thursday afternoon, and the province said it wasn’t linked to a specific location, date, or exposure. Despite this, health officials do believe the disease is still spreading. “Because measles spreads very easily, we are reminding those living […]

title: Teen critical after live-in partner assaults her in Gurugram during fight over marriage plans
desc: According to police, the woman, a biotechnology student at a university in Gurugram, had been living with the accused after they met in September 2025. They were reportedly discussing marriage, with talks initiated between the families.

title: Popular Female Celebrity Shows Off Her New Face After 100 Million KRW Worth Of Surgeries
desc: A female celebrity has taken the internet by storm with her changed visuals after a series of cosmetic surgeries.

title: How Reuters captured the photo of former Prince Andrew leaving custody
desc: Feb 19 (Reuters) - Slumped in the back seat of ⁠his Range Rover, a visibly shaken man once referred to as the "Playboy Prince" stares ahead of him as the car ⁠leaves Aylsham police station in Norfolk, England.

title: Philanthropic Partnership Backs Country-Led Research to Guide the Use of AI in Health
desc: The Gates Foundation, Novo Nordisk Foundation, and Wellcome will support locally led evaluations of AI tools that have the potential to improve health outcomes in low- and middle-income countries.

desc: Sky's Ed Conway is shown one of the 12 vast vaults where the world's largest single deposit of gold is kept on behalf of its many owners.
